description.@en: Whenever Gnomes go to sleep, it is whispered that they turn to stone. While this seems like a wild tale, there seems to be some truth to it. Their skin oft turns a shade of grey as they rest as if all the blood had been drained from their veins!

effect.@en: You are never left Helpless for any reason, and thus cannot be made victim to a coup de grâce: your skin is turned entirely to stone as a preternatural defense mechanism whenever you’re Helpless.
